name: Original Will Food Pack V
description: A top-class chef with the ability to make any ingredients into ultimate delicacy. Please use these ingredients to show your strength. (Open the pack to find some top-rated food ingredients)

name: Original Will Gashapon
description: A Gashapon toy to express personal feelings, open it to randomly receive one headwear of Jan 2018 [Memory] series.

name: Original Will·Poring Balloon
description: "This is the first Flying Intricate Device we took as adventurers during our time on this vast fantasy continent. Overlooking the entire [riverside] at a high altitude, so quiet and green, people were bustling like flags in a sandbox, going forward to foreign lands is what people call exploration. Music rings again, we agreed, in the coming year, we must take a bird's eye view of the scenery. This landscape can't be described in words. Of course, I'll still have you around, and your innocent smile."

name: Original Will·Poring Balloon Blueprint
chineseName: 勿忘初心·波利气球图纸

name: Orleans Necklace
description: A necklace once worn by Orleans, the cooking genius.

name: Orleans Necklace [1]
description: A necklace once worn by Orleans, the cooking genius.

name: Orleans's Gloves
description: Gloves used by the best royal chef. User can imitate the chef's action when you wear it.

name: Orleans's Gloves [1]
description: Gloves used by the best royal chef. User can imitate the chef's action when you wear it.

name: Orleans's Gown
description: A uniform worn by a monstrous court attendant. No one can interrupt him as long as he begins speaking.
effect: CT Variable ＋20%,The skill's effect will not be interrupted

description: A uniform worn by a monstrous court attendant. No one can interrupt him as long as he begins speaking.

name: Orleans's Server
description: A round iron plate carrying dishes, extremely smooth.

name: Orleans's Server [1]
description: A round iron plate carrying dishes, extremely smooth.

name: Osiris Doll
description: A doll designed like Osiris. It permanently increases the character's Crit by 20 points and cannot be traded.

name: Osston's Coin
description: A coin engraved with the challenger's name. It symbolizes honor and strength for dueling clubs.

name: Ouch! Kobold
description: It is said that everyone who wears this hat will recall the horrible Kobold in Kordt Forest.

name: Ouroboros Axe
description: The power of the battle axe was as strong as the giant serpent. It can crush the enemy effortlessly in the battle.
